name: The Shadow of Murder
description:
# Story

Welcome to the Spain of 1953. Today is Friday and it is a beautiful summer day, a summer that promises to be unforgettable for our four friends.

During this journey you will be Juan, a famous detective. You will be surrounded by Teresa (Juan's girlfriend), Manuel (Juan's best friend) and Emilia (Juan's sister) and all of you have decided to spend a weekend off in a small but cozy cottage in the forest, away from the hustle and bustle of city life.

         

What a thrill to be able to spend quality time together! But what started out as a fun weekend will soon turn into an intriguing investigation full of mystery and darkness.

Are you ready? Because you're walking into a macabre story full of suspects, clues and unexpected twists and turns

# Notes

This is a visual novel made for Neophyte Studios' 5th Narrative Game Jam. In approx. 5 days. We have created it completely from scratch.

Currently a small "Act" of the story arc is missing, however it will be available a few days after the end of the Jam.

On behalf of the entire development team, we hope you enjoy the game and play it again in its final version.
